description:
Dark Star emerges before the gate can be closed, and Lina and the crew attack with all they`ve got! Just as the powerful entity seems to be defeated, he escapes - and Valgaav appears!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: No Way to Guess! The Forbidden Gateway Is Opened!
Présomptions impossibles ! La porte défendue s`ouvre !
Suisoku Funou! Hirakareshi Kindan no Mon!
推測不能! 開かれし禁断の門!
